TopicTitle: Fuel production methods on other planterty bodies

Articles.Content:
Ther are a multitude of was to make fuel in space, the most simple being electrolysing heater to make hydrogen and oxygen.

A another possible was is :

http://news.discovery.com/space/moon-mining-needed-to-fuel-space-exploration-110713.htm

A another is:

http://www.wickmanspacecraft.com/lsp.html

2 more are:

http://www.wired.com/2012/11/making-rocket-fuel-on-mars-1978/

Out all all these methods I would recommend the Alice method using alimunim and ice on the moon, this method is in ksp interstella mod pack.

Bug the mars methane method is promising using hydrogen and co2 that is commenly found in the Martin amthosphere

Resource collection is on the what not to suggest list on the top of this forum

Thread closed.
